article.headline: As praries make a comback, bison roam

metadata.narrative_thread: Bison are an amazing animal that is changing everything.
metadata.caption_content: A bison peers from the long grass at the Nachusa Grasslands prairie restoration site on Dec. 12, 2014, in Franklin Grove, Ill. Bill Kleiman, the project director, says the bison have done very well since their arrival in early October.

content.question: How long have bison been absent from the landscape?
content.answer: For almost 1,000 years, bison have been absent

content.description_text: The number of bison in Chicago
